title: [Grawood Farmstead, Town]
description: A blocky building walled with squared stones and roofed with drab grey-green tin sits off to the side of the road, interrupting the fence that creates a perimeter for the town.  The split-rail barrier picks up on the other side of the building and travels on, though several lengths of heavy chain are draped across the upper rail nearest the stone wall.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
